entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
